message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value and significance to us. Given its worth of $10,000 to you, I propose an offer that reflects its true value. Would you consider purchasing it for $9,500? This offer is exclusive to you and represents a special opportunity to own a piece that we believe will exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or need further details, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
